Symbol Definition
K𝐾K The number of devices
G𝐺G The number of groups
B𝐵B The number of blocks
N𝑁N Dimension of local block update
Rksubscript𝑅𝑘R_{k} Dimensionality reduction ratio
Qksubscript𝑄𝑘Q_{k} The number of quantization bits
Sksubscript𝑆𝑘S_{k} Sparsity level

𝒈k(t,b)superscriptsubscript𝒈𝑘𝑡𝑏{\boldsymbol{g}}_{k}^{(t,b)} Local block update

𝚫k(t,b)superscriptsubscript𝚫𝑘𝑡𝑏{\boldsymbol{\Delta}}_{k}^{(t,b)} Residual vector

Key symbols and their definitions considered in the paper are summarized in Table I.
